texts.text: /2022/11/06/amateur-guide-to-running/

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: advice
texts.text: advice

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: exercise
texts.text: exercise

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: running
texts.text: running

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I love to run. It gives me an opportunity go outside and create challenges for myself. It also provides time to think.
texts.text: I love to run. It gives me an opportunity go outside and create challenges for myself. It also provides time to think.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Getting started was one of the toughest parts. I went through all kinds of running programs and equipment but never felt like I was improving as much as I wanted.
texts.text: Getting started was one of the toughest parts. I went through all kinds of running programs and equipment but never felt like I was improving as much as I wanted.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This post covers all of the great advice I received along my running journey and some warnings about mistakes I made.
texts.text: This post covers all of the great advice I received along my running journey and some warnings about mistakes I made.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Know your limits
texts.text: Know your limits

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: First and foremost, know what your body can and  should  do. Talk to a medical professional you trust about any previous injuries or medical conditions that might impact you while you're running.
texts.text: First and foremost, know what your body can and  should  do. Talk to a medical professional you trust about any previous injuries or medical conditions that might impact you while you're running.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Bad news doesn't signal an end to your running ambitions. It just meant you might need to adapt your workout to fit within your body's needs.
texts.text: Bad news doesn't signal an end to your running ambitions. It just meant you might need to adapt your workout to fit within your body's needs.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Make a plan and follow the plan
texts.text: Make a plan and follow the plan

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: As I said earlier, I had tons of difficulty getting started with a running routine. I have asthma and it was once a big limiter on what I could do when I exercised.
texts.text: As I said earlier, I had tons of difficulty getting started with a running routine. I have asthma and it was once a big limiter on what I could do when I exercised.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Two big things changed the game for me.
texts.text: Two big things changed the game for me.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: First, a friend told me about the  Couch to 5K  (C25K) program. It's designed for running novices and eases you into running longer and longer distances. Everything is free to use and the instructions are translated into plenty of languages.
texts.text: First, a friend told me about the  Couch to 5K  (C25K) program. It's designed for running novices and eases you into running longer and longer distances. Everything is free to use and the instructions are translated into plenty of languages.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: C25K offers a running schedule where you gradually increase the ratio of running intervals to walking intervals over time. You might start with a two minute walk followed by a one minute jog. Over time, that turns into a 90 second walk followed by a one minute jog. By the end, you're spending much less time walking and more time running.
texts.text: C25K offers a running schedule where you gradually increase the ratio of running intervals to walking intervals over time. You might start with a two minute walk followed by a one minute jog. Over time, that turns into a 90 second walk followed by a one minute jog. By the end, you're spending much less time walking and more time running.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Second, I changed my diet. I've written a lot about the  ketogenic diet , or keto, on this blog before. Long story short, you drastically reduce your carbohydrate intake to a very small amount (usually 20-30g or less) and increase your fat/protein intake. This has tons of effects inside the body that would take too long to list here, but the one that benefited me the most was a reduction in my overall inflammation markers in my body.
texts.text: Second, I changed my diet. I've written a lot about the  ketogenic diet , or keto, on this blog before. Long story short, you drastically reduce your carbohydrate intake to a very small amount (usually 20-30g or less) and increase your fat/protein intake. This has tons of effects inside the body that would take too long to list here, but the one that benefited me the most was a reduction in my overall inflammation markers in my body.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Higher levels of inflammation lead to all kinds of problems, including asthma. After changing my diet, I worked with my doctor to stop all of the medications I was taking and my asthma is barely noticeable today.
texts.text: Higher levels of inflammation lead to all kinds of problems, including asthma. After changing my diet, I worked with my doctor to stop all of the medications I was taking and my asthma is barely noticeable today.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: These two parts of the process, following a plan and changing my diet, greatly improved my confidence while running.
texts.text: These two parts of the process, following a plan and changing my diet, greatly improved my confidence while running.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Shoes
texts.text: Shoes

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My tennis coach in high school had a wonderful phrase to remind us that our beloved rackets and shoes only did so much:
texts.text: My tennis coach in high school had a wonderful phrase to remind us that our beloved rackets and shoes only did so much:

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It's not the tool, it's the fool.
texts.text: It's not the tool, it's the fool.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: His point was that you can't blame poor performance on your equipment. However, running shoes with poor cushioning and reduced support will certainly impede your progress.
texts.text: His point was that you can't blame poor performance on your equipment. However, running shoes with poor cushioning and reduced support will certainly impede your progress.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Does that mean you must spend a fortune on running shoes? No.
texts.text: Does that mean you must spend a fortune on running shoes? No.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It does mean that you need to fight the right equipment  for your body .
texts.text: It does mean that you need to fight the right equipment  for your body .

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Find a running shop near you and talk with someone there about your goals and challenges. In the San Antonio area, we have a store called  Fleet Feet  that's staffed by people who run all the time. They had a look at how I ran and they asked me where I felt the impact while running. I told them where I had pain and where the impact didn't feel quite right.
texts.text: Find a running shop near you and talk with someone there about your goals and challenges. In the San Antonio area, we have a store called  Fleet Feet  that's staffed by people who run all the time. They had a look at how I ran and they asked me where I felt the impact while running. I told them where I had pain and where the impact didn't feel quite right.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It turns out I suffer from  overpronation . My foot rolls inward as I run and it means the outer part of my foot hits the ground first. That caused a lot of pain.
texts.text: It turns out I suffer from  overpronation . My foot rolls inward as I run and it means the outer part of my foot hits the ground first. That caused a lot of pain.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: They recommended shoes specifically meant to help with that condition. I picked up some  Mizuno Wave Inspire  shoes and they helped a ton! They usually go for $140-$170 and they lasted me 300-400 miles easily. My only complaints about them was that they are  quite heavy . They feel bulky on my feet.
texts.text: They recommended shoes specifically meant to help with that condition. I picked up some  Mizuno Wave Inspire  shoes and they helped a ton! They usually go for $140-$170 and they lasted me 300-400 miles easily. My only complaints about them was that they are  quite heavy . They feel bulky on my feet.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: A friend suggested the  Brooks Adrenaline GTS  and they're my current go-to running shoe. I'm on my second pair now and my first pair easily went past 450 miles before the tread was gone. They are also on the pricier end around $140, but they're incredibly durable, light, and supportive.
texts.text: A friend suggested the  Brooks Adrenaline GTS  and they're my current go-to running shoe. I'm on my second pair now and my first pair easily went past 450 miles before the tread was gone. They are also on the pricier end around $140, but they're incredibly durable, light, and supportive.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Technology
texts.text: Technology

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The sky's the limit when it comes to running technology.
texts.text: The sky's the limit when it comes to running technology.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've had a  Garmin Fenix 5  since 2017 and it's one of the best-performing, most reliable pieces of technology I've ever bought. Why do I love it so much?
texts.text: I've had a  Garmin Fenix 5  since 2017 and it's one of the best-performing, most reliable pieces of technology I've ever bought. Why do I love it so much?

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: It's comfortable to wear
texts.text: It's comfortable to wear

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The GPS and health tracking is top notch and extremely accurate
texts.text: The GPS and health tracking is top notch and extremely accurate

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: It works really well with the Garmin Connect Android app across multiple phones
texts.text: It works really well with the Garmin Connect Android app across multiple phones

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: I can use it for almost any sport imaginable (running, walking, biking, swimming, etc)
texts.text: I can use it for almost any sport imaginable (running, walking, biking, swimming, etc)

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You can't break it
texts.text: You can't break it

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: It's reliable
texts.text: It's reliable

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Over time, there were more things I wanted to track, like ground contact time and balance between my left and right feet. I picked up a  Running Dynamics Pod  for that. It's a tiny device that attaches to your waistband and delivers tons of additional metrics automatically. It sends all of its data to your watch while you run.
texts.text: Over time, there were more things I wanted to track, like ground contact time and balance between my left and right feet. I picked up a  Running Dynamics Pod  for that. It's a tiny device that attaches to your waistband and delivers tons of additional metrics automatically. It sends all of its data to your watch while you run.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Music
texts.text: Music

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Music keeps me inspired while I run and I have a two part strategy for that.
texts.text: Music keeps me inspired while I run and I have a two part strategy for that.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: First come the earbuds. I've tried far too many earbuds and I've been disappointed with so many of them. I love the  Jaybird Vista 2  earbuds for a few reasons:
texts.text: First come the earbuds. I've tried far too many earbuds and I've been disappointed with so many of them. I love the  Jaybird Vista 2  earbuds for a few reasons:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: They sound great
texts.text: They sound great

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: The charging case is easy to use and has a built-in battery to charge the buds
texts.text: The charging case is easy to use and has a built-in battery to charge the buds

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: They don't fall out of my ears
texts.text: They don't fall out of my ears

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Bluetooth sync is easy to set up and maintain
texts.text: Bluetooth sync is easy to set up and maintain

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Second, I needed a way to keep my phone attached to me where it wouldn't be flopping around all over the place. Putting a big phone in my shorts pocket ensured that it would bang against my leg for a few miles. The folks at Fleet Feet suggested the  FlipBelt .
texts.text: Second, I needed a way to keep my phone attached to me where it wouldn't be flopping around all over the place. Putting a big phone in my shorts pocket ensured that it would bang against my leg for a few miles. The folks at Fleet Feet suggested the  FlipBelt .

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: It's a stretchy belt that has lots of slash pockets to hold keys, credit cards, and your phone. You fold it over once and it stays tightly attached to your waist or hips. Now I can run for many miles and I forget my phone is on my waist.
texts.text: It's a stretchy belt that has lots of slash pockets to hold keys, credit cards, and your phone. You fold it over once and it stays tightly attached to your waist or hips. Now I can run for many miles and I forget my phone is on my waist.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Know your limits
texts.text: Know your limits

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Wait, didn't I mention this before? I did, but it's worth mentioning once more.
texts.text: Wait, didn't I mention this before? I did, but it's worth mentioning once more.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My usual distance for running is 5 km, or about 3.11 miles. A 5K is a very common race length in the USA and it usually takes me about a half hour to complete. However, when I first started, I was targeting a mile to a mile and a half.
texts.text: My usual distance for running is 5 km, or about 3.11 miles. A 5K is a very common race length in the USA and it usually takes me about a half hour to complete. However, when I first started, I was targeting a mile to a mile and a half.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Work your way up to longer distances slowly.
texts.text: Work your way up to longer distances slowly.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I traveled to Vancouver for the first time for a conference and I was mesmerized by the waterfront. After walking it for a while, I decided to run some of it. I went back to the hotel, changed, stretched, got dressed, and headed out.
texts.text: I traveled to Vancouver for the first time for a conference and I was mesmerized by the waterfront. After walking it for a while, I decided to run some of it. I went back to the hotel, changed, stretched, got dressed, and headed out.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The view was incredible. I loved it. Once I reached about 2.5km, I thought "Well, I could run back now and just complete a 5K. Perfect."
texts.text: The view was incredible. I loved it. Once I reached about 2.5km, I thought "Well, I could run back now and just complete a 5K. Perfect."

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: However, the weather was so nice and the views so beautiful that I kept going. Once I reached 5km, I thought "Okay, time to head back," but then I didn't.
texts.text: However, the weather was so nice and the views so beautiful that I kept going. Once I reached 5km, I thought "Okay, time to head back," but then I didn't.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: After running 10km down the waterfront, I was still feeling awesome but I knew it was time to turn back. I realized something was wrong a few minutes later. My right knee felt like I'd been shot.
texts.text: After running 10km down the waterfront, I was still feeling awesome but I knew it was time to turn back. I realized something was wrong a few minutes later. My right knee felt like I'd been shot.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I slowly hobbled several kilometers to the hotel and put ice on my knee. The rest of the week was spent hobbling through the conference and suffering through the plane flights home in a cramped seat.
texts.text: I slowly hobbled several kilometers to the hotel and put ice on my knee. The rest of the week was spent hobbling through the conference and suffering through the plane flights home in a cramped seat.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: What did I learn? Don't overdo it. Let your body tell you when to stop.
texts.text: What did I learn? Don't overdo it. Let your body tell you when to stop.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Even if the view is amazing.
texts.text: Even if the view is amazing.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: vancouver.jpg
